text.section: After notice and hearing as required under Title 10, Subtitle 1 of the State Government Article, the Department may determine whether a location is a hazardous location.

After notice and hearing, the Department may except from safety glazing requirements a panel in a hazardous location if the panel:
is less than 200 square inches; and
is located so that the use of material other than safety glazing material would not constitute an unreasonable hazard.
